foods.name: 蒜泥蛋黄酱
foods.description: 普罗旺斯和加泰罗尼亚的蒜味蛋黄酱，配海鲜和蔬菜。
foods.descriptionEn: Garlic aioli from Provence and Catalonia, served with seafood and vegetables.

foods.name: 苹果派
foods.description: 英国传统甜点，
foods.descriptionEn: Traditional British dessert. The phrase "American as apple pie" made it an American cultural icon.

foods.name: 果仁蜜饼
foods.description: 层层酥皮夹坚果淋蜂蜜，土耳其和希腊都声称原创，中东各国皆有版本。
foods.descriptionEn: Layers of phyllo pastry filled with nuts and honey. Both Turkey and Greece claim its origin.

foods.name: 香醋
foods.description: 摩德纳和雷焦艾米利亚的特产，陈年香醋是意大利美食的瑰宝。
foods.descriptionEn: Specialty of Modena and Reggio Emilia. Aged balsamic vinegar is a treasure of Italian cuisine.

foods.name: 布朗尼
foods.description: 芝加哥世博会发明的巧克力方块蛋糕，湿润浓郁是特点。
foods.descriptionEn: Chocolate square cake invented at the Chicago World's Fair. Known for its moist and rich texture.

foods.name: 奶酪
foods.description: 传说游牧民族无意间发现，法国有400多种奶酪，是西方饮食的重要组成。
foods.descriptionEn: Legend says nomads discovered it accidentally. France has over 400 cheese varieties, an important part of Western cuisine.

foods.name: 芝士蛋糕
foods.description: 古希腊奥运选手的食物，纽约芝士蛋糕和日式轻芝士各有风格。
foods.descriptionEn: Originated in ancient Greece. New York cheesecake and Japanese light cheesecake each have unique styles.

foods.name: 阿根廷青酱
foods.description: 阿根廷烤肉的绝配，香芹、大蒜、橄榄油的组合。
foods.descriptionEn: Perfect pairing for Argentine grilled meat. A combination of parsley, garlic, and olive oil.

foods.name: 薯片
foods.description: 纽约萨拉托加泉发明，据说是为了报复抱怨薯条太厚的顾客。
foods.descriptionEn: Invented in Saratoga Springs, New York. Allegedly made to spite a customer complaining fries were too thick.

foods.name: 巧克力
foods.description: 瑞士人发明了现代固体巧克力，瑞士和比利时巧克力是高品质的代名词。
foods.descriptionEn: The Swiss invented modern solid chocolate. Swiss and Belgian chocolates are synonymous with high quality.

foods.name: 吉事果
foods.description: 西班牙的油炸条，配热巧克力蘸食，拉美各国也很流行。
foods.descriptionEn: Spanish fried dough sticks, served with hot chocolate for dipping. Popular throughout Latin America.

foods.name: 酸辣酱
foods.description: 印度的果酱/酱料，芒果酸辣酱最有名，配咖喱和萨摩萨。
foods.descriptionEn: Indian jam/sauce. Mango chutney is most famous, served with curry and samosas.

foods.name: 曲奇
foods.description: 荷兰语
foods.descriptionEn: Evolved from Dutch "koekje" (little cake). Chocolate chip cookies are an American invention.

foods.name: 焦糖布丁
foods.description: 法式经典甜点，香草蛋奶冻上覆焦糖脆层。
foods.descriptionEn: Classic French dessert. Vanilla custard topped with a layer of caramelized sugar.

foods.name: 可丽饼
foods.description: 布列塔尼的荞麦咸薄饼演变出的小麦甜薄饼，巴黎街头和日本原宿的人气小吃。
foods.descriptionEn: Evolved from Brittany's buckwheat savory crepes. Popular street food in Paris and Harajuku, Japan.

foods.name: 可颂
foods.description: 为庆祝维也纳击败奥斯曼帝国而创造，法国人将其发扬光大成为早餐代表。
foods.descriptionEn: Created to celebrate Vienna's victory over the Ottoman Empire. The French perfected it as a breakfast icon.

foods.name: 团子
foods.description: 日本糯米丸子串，三色团子最有名，赏樱必备甜点。
foods.descriptionEn: Japanese rice dumpling skewers. Tri-color dango is most famous, essential for cherry blossom viewing.

foods.name: 甜甜圈
foods.description: 荷兰移民带来的油炸糕点演变，美国警察与甜甜圈的关联是文化梗。
foods.descriptionEn: Evolved from fried cakes brought by Dutch immigrants. The association between American police and donuts is a cultural meme.

foods.name: 铜锣烧
foods.description: 红豆馅夹两片松饼，因哆啦A梦而闻名全球。
foods.descriptionEn: Red bean filling sandwiched between two pancakes. Famous worldwide thanks to Doraemon.

foods.name: 毛豆
foods.description: 未成熟大豆，日式居酒屋标配，如今是全球健康零食。
foods.descriptionEn: Immature soybeans. Standard at Japanese izakayas, now a global healthy snack.

foods.name: 蛋挞
foods.description: 葡萄牙修道院的发明，澳门葡挞和港式蛋挞是变体。
foods.descriptionEn: Invented by Portuguese monasteries. Macau Portuguese tarts and Hong Kong-style egg tarts are variants.

foods.name: 鱼露
foods.description: 东南亚的灵魂调味料，发酵鱼提取，是越南和泰国菜的基础。
foods.descriptionEn: Soul seasoning of Southeast Asia. Extracted from fermented fish. Base of Vietnamese and Thai cuisine.

foods.name: 焦糖布丁
foods.description: 罗马人发明的蛋奶布丁，西班牙和拉美的经典甜点。
foods.descriptionEn: Egg custard invented by Romans. A classic dessert in Spain and Latin America.

foods.name: 薯条
foods.description: 起源有争议，比利时和法国都声称发明，美国快餐业使其风靡全球。
foods.descriptionEn: Origin disputed between Belgium and France. American fast food industry made it popular worldwide.

foods.name: 意式冰淇淋
foods.description: 意大利冰淇淋，比美式冰淇淋更致密绵滑，脂肪含量更低。
foods.descriptionEn: Italian ice cream. Denser and smoother than American ice cream, with lower fat content.

foods.name: 辣椒酱
foods.description: 韩国的发酵辣椒酱，甜辣咸鲜，拌饭和烤肉必备，韩流带动全球流行。
foods.descriptionEn: Korean fermented chili paste. Sweet, spicy, salty, and savory. Essential for bibimbap and grilled meat. Popularized globally by Korean Wave.

foods.name: 牛油果酱
foods.description: 墨西哥牛油果酱，阿兹特克人的发明，配玉米片食用。
foods.descriptionEn: Mexican avocado sauce. Aztec invention, served with tortilla chips.

foods.name: 印度甜球
foods.description: 奶粉面团炸制后浸糖浆，印度最受欢迎的甜点，节日必备。
foods.descriptionEn: Milk powder dough balls fried and soaked in sugar syrup. India's most popular dessert, essential for festivals.

foods.name: 哈里萨辣酱
foods.description: 北非的辣椒酱，配古斯古斯和塔吉锅，是马格里布菜的标志。
foods.descriptionEn: North African chili paste. Served with couscous and tagine, a signature of Maghrebi cuisine.

foods.name: 海鲜酱
foods.description: 甜咸的酱料，北京烤鸭和越南河粉的配料。
foods.descriptionEn: Sweet and savory sauce. Used with Peking duck and Vietnamese pho.

foods.name: 鹰嘴豆泥
foods.description: 中东的经典蘸酱，搭配皮塔饼食用，如今成为全球健康食品。
foods.descriptionEn: A classic Middle Eastern dip, eaten with pita bread. Now a global health food.

foods.name: 冰淇淋
foods.description: 从唐代的冰酪到意大利的Gelato到美国的商业冰淇淋，不断演变。
foods.descriptionEn: Evolved from Tang Dynasty frozen treats to Italian gelato to American commercial ice cream.

foods.name: 印度甜卷
foods.description: 螺旋状炸面圈浸糖浆，来自波斯的甜点，印度街头常见。
foods.descriptionEn: Spiral-shaped fried dough soaked in sugar syrup. A Persian dessert, commonly seen on Indian streets.

foods.name: 番茄酱
foods.description: 亨氏番茄酱定义了现代番茄酱，薯条和汉堡的经典搭配。
foods.descriptionEn: Heinz ketchup defined modern ketchup. The classic pairing with fries and hamburgers.

foods.name: 印度米布丁
foods.description: 印度传统甜品，牛奶煮米配豆蔻和坚果。
foods.descriptionEn: Traditional Indian dessert. Rice cooked in milk with cardamom and nuts.

foods.name: 泡菜
foods.description: 韩国的国民食品，辣白菜是16世纪辣椒传入后的产物，之前的泡菜不辣。
foods.descriptionEn: Korea's national food. Spicy kimchi emerged after chili peppers arrived in the 16th century; earlier versions were not spicy.

foods.name: 库纳法
foods.description: 中东芝士甜点，面丝包裹芝士烤制后淋糖浆，纳布卢斯版最有名。
foods.descriptionEn: Middle Eastern cheese dessert. Shredded dough filled with cheese, baked, and drizzled with syrup. Nablus version is most famous.

foods.name: 马卡龙
foods.description: 意大利传入法国，Ladurée将其改良为夹心版，成为巴黎甜点的象征。
foods.descriptionEn: French sandwich cookie. Ladurée and Pierre Hermé made it a luxury item.

foods.name: 蛋黄酱
foods.description: 法国厨师在梅诺卡岛发明，日本丘比蛋黄酱是独特变体。
foods.descriptionEn: Invented by a French chef in Menorca. Japanese Kewpie mayonnaise is a unique variant.

foods.name: 味醂
foods.description: 日本的甜味料酒，照烧酱和各种日式调味的基础。
foods.descriptionEn: Japanese sweet cooking wine. Base for teriyaki sauce and various Japanese seasonings.

foods.name: 味噌
foods.description: 日本对中国酱的改良，味噌汤是日本家庭的日常饮食。
foods.descriptionEn: Japan's adaptation of Chinese fermented paste. Miso soup is a daily staple in Japanese households.

foods.name: 麻糬
foods.description: 日本传统糯米点心，新年必吃镜饼，冰淇淋麻糬是现代变体。
foods.descriptionEn: Traditional Japanese rice cake. Kagami mochi is essential for New Year. Mochi ice cream is a modern variant.

foods.name: 墨西哥酱
foods.description: 墨西哥复合酱料，混合辣椒、巧克力等20多种食材，瓦哈卡黑酱最著名。
foods.descriptionEn: Mexican compound sauce mixing chili, chocolate, and 20+ ingredients. Oaxacan black mole is most famous.

foods.name: 月饼
foods.description: 中秋节传统食品，广式、苏式、潮式各有特色，五仁和蛋黄莲蓉是经典口味。
foods.descriptionEn: Traditional Mid-Autumn Festival food. Cantonese, Suzhou, and Teochew styles each have characteristics. Five kernel and lotus seed paste with egg yolk are classic flavors.

foods.name: 芥末酱
foods.description: 第戎芥末最有名，美国黄芥末配热狗，德国芥末配香肠。
foods.descriptionEn: Dijon mustard is most famous. American yellow mustard with hot dogs, German mustard with sausages.

foods.name: 墨西哥玉米片
foods.description: 墨西哥边境小镇发明，炸玉米片配奶酪和辣椒，美国体育赛事小吃。
foods.descriptionEn: Invented in a Mexican border town. Fried corn chips with cheese and chili. American sports event snack.

foods.name: 纳豆
foods.description: 日本的发酵大豆，粘稠拉丝、气味强烈，爱恨分明的健康食品。
foods.descriptionEn: Japanese fermented soybeans. Sticky and stringy with strong smell. A polarizing health food.

foods.name: 橄榄油
foods.description: 地中海饮食的基石，被称为液体黄金，现代健康饮食的明星。
foods.descriptionEn: The cornerstone of Mediterranean diet, called liquid gold. A star of modern healthy eating.

foods.name: 洋葱圈
foods.description: 美国发明的油炸小吃，是汉堡薯条之外的快餐配菜选择。
foods.descriptionEn: American fried snack. An alternative side dish to fries and burgers.

foods.name: 蚝油
foods.description: 广东李锦记创始人李锦裳发明，粤菜和东南亚菜的常用调味料。
foods.descriptionEn: Invented by Lee Kum Sheung, founder of Lee Kum Kee in Guangdong. Common seasoning in Cantonese and Southeast Asian cuisine.

foods.name: 煎饼
foods.description: 美式早餐的代表，配枫糖浆和黄油，是美国家庭周末早餐传统。
foods.descriptionEn: Symbol of American breakfast. Served with maple syrup and butter. An American family weekend breakfast tradition.

foods.name: 意式奶冻
foods.description: 皮埃蒙特的甜点，奶油凝冻配水果酱或焦糖。
foods.descriptionEn: Piedmont dessert. Cream custard served with fruit sauce or caramel.

foods.name: 帕夫洛娃
foods.description: 以俄罗斯芭蕾舞者命名的蛋白霜甜点，澳新两国争论发源地。
foods.descriptionEn: Meringue dessert named after Russian ballerina. Australia and New Zealand dispute its origin.

foods.name: 山核桃派
foods.description: 美国南方的传统甜点，糖浆和山核桃的甜蜜组合。
foods.descriptionEn: Traditional Southern American dessert. Sweet combination of syrup and pecans.

foods.name: 青酱
foods.description: 热那亚的特产，罗勒、松子、帕尔马干酪、橄榄油的组合。
foods.descriptionEn: Specialty of Genoa. Combination of basil, pine nuts, Parmesan cheese, and olive oil.

foods.name: 腌黄瓜
foods.description: 人类最古老的保存食品之一，美国汉堡三明治的标配。
foods.descriptionEn: One of humanity's oldest preserved foods. Standard for American hamburgers and sandwiches.

foods.name: 柚子醋
foods.description: 柑橘汁加酱油的组合，配刺身、火锅的蘸料。
foods.descriptionEn: Combination of citrus juice and soy sauce. Dipping sauce for sashimi and hot pot.

foods.name: 爆米花
foods.description: 美洲原住民的传统，美国将其与电影院绑定，成为观影标配。
foods.descriptionEn: Native American tradition. America paired it with movie theaters, making it a cinema staple.

foods.name: 椒盐卷饼
foods.description: 德国修道院发明的面包，美国版是软的大号版，德国版是脆的小型版。
foods.descriptionEn: Bread invented by German monasteries. American version is soft and large, German version is crispy and small.

foods.name: 南瓜派
foods.description: 美国感恩节传统甜点，南瓜泥配香料的经典组合。
foods.descriptionEn: Traditional American Thanksgiving dessert. Classic combination of pumpkin puree with spices.

foods.name: 参巴酱
foods.description: 东南亚的辣椒酱，种类繁多，马来和印尼菜的基础调味。
foods.descriptionEn: Southeast Asian chili sauce. Many varieties. Base seasoning for Malay and Indonesian cuisine.

foods.name: 酸菜
foods.description: 发酵白菜，可能由蒙古人传入欧洲，德国版配香肠，法国阿尔萨斯版是名菜。
foods.descriptionEn: Fermented cabbage. Possibly brought to Europe by Mongols. German version with sausages, French Alsatian version is a famous dish.

foods.name: 刨冰
foods.description: 亚洲夏季甜品，台湾芒果冰、日本刨冰、韩国红豆冰各有特色。
foods.descriptionEn: Asian summer dessert. Taiwan mango ice, Japanese kakigori, and Korean patbingsu each have unique styles.

foods.name: 酱油
foods.description: 东亚烹饪的灵魂调味料，日本万字酱油和中国生抽老抽各有特色。
foods.descriptionEn: The soul of East Asian cooking. Japanese Kikkoman and Chinese light/dark soy sauce each have unique characteristics.

foods.name: 是拉差辣酱
foods.description: 泰国发明，越南华裔在美国生产的汇丰公司版本风靡全球。
foods.descriptionEn: Invented in Thailand. Vietnamese-Chinese produced version by Huy Fong Foods in America became globally popular.

foods.name: 臭豆腐
foods.description: 长沙和台湾的特色小吃，闻着臭吃着香的发酵豆制品。
foods.descriptionEn: Specialty snack from Changsha and Taiwan. Fermented tofu that smells bad but tastes good.

foods.name: 塔巴斯科辣酱
foods.description: 路易斯安那州发明的发酵辣酱，小瓶装的全球辣酱标准。
foods.descriptionEn: Fermented hot sauce invented in Louisiana. Small bottle global hot sauce standard.

foods.name: 芝麻酱
foods.description: 中东的芝麻酱是鹰嘴豆泥的成分，中国的芝麻酱配麻酱面。
foods.descriptionEn: Middle Eastern sesame paste is an ingredient in hummus. Chinese sesame paste is served with sesame noodles.

foods.name: 鲷鱼烧
foods.description: 鱼形红豆饼，日本街头小吃代表，韩国版叫붕어빵。
foods.descriptionEn: Fish-shaped red bean cake. Representative Japanese street snack. Korean version is called Bungeoppang.

foods.name: 章鱼烧
foods.description: 大阪发明的街头小吃，圆形面糊球包裹章鱼块。
foods.descriptionEn: Osaka street food invented in 1935. Round batter balls filled with octopus pieces.

foods.name: 糖葫芦
foods.description: 北方传统小吃，山楂裹糖，是中国冬季街头的标志性食物。
foods.descriptionEn: Traditional northern snack. Hawthorn coated in sugar. Iconic winter street food in China.

foods.name: 汤圆
foods.description: 元宵节传统食品，糯米团子包甜馅，象征团圆。
foods.descriptionEn: Traditional Lantern Festival food. Glutinous rice balls with sweet filling, symbolizing reunion.

foods.name: 天贝
foods.description: 印尼的发酵大豆饼，菌丝将豆子绑在一起，比豆腐更有嚼劲的植物蛋白。
foods.descriptionEn: Indonesian fermented soybean cake. Fungal mycelium binds beans together. Plant protein chewier than tofu.

foods.name: 照烧酱
foods.description: 酱油、味醂、糖的组合，是日式西餐化的调味基础。
foods.descriptionEn: Combination of soy sauce, mirin, and sugar. Base for Japanese-Western fusion seasoning.

foods.name: 提拉米苏
foods.description: 威尼托大区发明的咖啡甜点，意大利语意为
foods.descriptionEn: Italian dessert star. Coffee-soaked ladyfingers with mascarpone cheese.

foods.name: 豆腐
foods.description: 相传淮南王刘安发明，东亚素食蛋白质的主要来源，如今成为全球健康食品。
foods.descriptionEn: Allegedly invented by Liu An, Prince of Huainan. The main vegetarian protein source in East Asia, now a global health food.

foods.name: 三奶蛋糕
foods.description: 用三种奶（炼乳、淡奶、鲜奶油）浸透的湿润蛋糕，拉美甜点代表。
foods.descriptionEn: Moist cake soaked in three types of milk (condensed milk, evaporated milk, heavy cream). Representative Latin American dessert.

foods.name: 酸奶黄瓜酱
foods.description: 希腊的酸奶酱，配希腊烤肉和皮塔饼，土耳其版叫cacık。
foods.descriptionEn: Greek yogurt sauce. Served with Greek grilled meat and pita bread. Turkish version is called cacık.

foods.name: 醋
foods.description: 人类最古老的调味料之一，山西陈醋、意大利香醋、日本米醋各有特色。
foods.descriptionEn: One of humanity's oldest seasonings. Shanxi aged vinegar, Italian balsamic vinegar, and Japanese rice vinegar each have characteristics.

foods.name: 华夫饼
foods.description: 比利时的两种华夫（布鲁塞尔和列日）都很有名，美国发展出早餐华夫。
foods.descriptionEn: Both Belgian types (Brussels and Liège) are famous. America developed breakfast waffles.

foods.name: 山葵
foods.description: 日本特有的调味料，新鲜山葵价格昂贵，大部分是辣根染色的替代品。
foods.descriptionEn: Japanese unique seasoning. Fresh wasabi is expensive. Most is dyed horseradish substitute.

foods.name: 伍斯特酱
foods.description: 英国伍斯特郡发明的发酵酱汁，血腥玛丽鸡尾酒的成分。
foods.descriptionEn: Fermented sauce invented in Worcestershire, England. Ingredient in Bloody Mary cocktails.
